title: 1.8 Pre v2 更新內容
author: well
txt_content:
原帖: http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/611324-regarding-18-pre-release-version-2-released/page__p__8076442#entry8076442

NOTICE
An updated version of the prerelease (with some major fixes!) is now available!
測試版更新發布 (包含一些重要修正)

As with major version releases, prerelease copies are normally distributed to trusted users and developers for bugfix testing and to enable mod updating in time for the official release.
Unfortunately, a version of the prerelease had been publicly leaked by one of the groups.
After a while the leak was sanctioned by Mojang and permission was given for this topic to be published.

為了發布主要版本，測試版通常會被分發給可信賴的用戶和開發人員進行測試和修正，使MOD能在官方發布時即時更新。
不幸的是，一個測試版本被團隊中的某人公開洩露。
不久洩漏版被Mojang認可，並授權批准本帖公布。

Current Version
Minecraft 1.8 Prerelease Version 2: http://assets.minecr...2/minecraft.jar
Server 1.8 Prerelease Version 2: http://assets.minecr...raft_server.jar
If the file ends in .zip, simply change it to .jar

Changes
更改
Mineshaft generation halved
礦坑生成減半
Three strongholds now spawn per map instead of one
現在每個地圖有三個碉堡生成，而不是一個

Bugfixes: If they still occur, send a PM!
錯誤修正
- No more lag when experience balls are dropped
經驗球掉落時不再延遲
- Furnace now smelting all items correctly
火爐現在可以正確冶煉物品
- No more client crashes when placing chests
放置箱子時客戶端不再崩潰
- Can now break blocks in Nether
現在可以在地獄裡破壞方塊
- Now able to go into position over broken Nether blocks in Creative mode
現在能夠在創造模式中, 進入被破壞地獄方塊的位置
- Actual silverfish name displayed when they kill a user instead of base name
當蠹蟲殺死玩家時, 顯示實際名字而不是基本名稱
- No more items being wiped when accessing Creative mode
進入創造模式時不再有物品被消除 
- No more randomly catching fire in Creative mode.
創造模式中不再隨機起火
- Unlimited water is now available in Creative Mode
創造模式中現在可使用無限水源
- Dyes are now in palette
染料現在放入調色盤中
- Endermen no longer hold grass with side texture visible on top
Endermen不能再拿取可從上方看到側面貼圖的草地塊
- Missing items from Creative Mode inventory have been added
創造模式物品欄裡遺漏的物品已加入
